description: D`Eon de Beaumont is a young knight working for the secret police of the French Government. When his sister Lia`s corpse is found floating down the River Seine in a coffin with the word `Psalms` inscribed on it, he becomes involved in a deadly struggle against revolutionaries and occultists to uncover the truth about his sister`s death. His character is loosely based on the historical Chevalier d`Eon.
name: D`Eon de Beaumont
